text:
*<!everyone>* happy friday folks!
---
thanks to the 30+ people who came to our co-working session earlier this week! we had a great discussion on content strategy, then spent about an hour working on our own strategy docs. it was productive, fun to meet people and a strong signal that we should do this more often. big thanks to <@U019F15SA7Q> for making it happen!
---
as usual, there are lots of great threads to highlight. a few especially interesting ones from the past few days:
• <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C016ENU9KNU/p1645083616362579|Any favorite books about [proofreading and the editorial process] that you’d recommend>? (:wave: <@U0337RNB86A>)
• <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CUYDAGXKR/p1645194805707859|Are there any amazing “resource hub” sections you’ve come across in SaaS-land that you were reeeally digging? Mainly looking for >*<https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CUYDAGXKR/p1645194805707859|downloadable >*<https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CUYDAGXKR/p1645194805707859|resource hubs (i.e. playbooks, reports, webinars, etc.), not just blog content>. (:wave: <@U02546A8D2B>)
• <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CUYDAGXKR/p1644974224991779|We have a great content operation for creating articles, reports, and ebooks, but don't have a ton of experience translating that content into infographics or interactive pieces. Would love to hear how your teams are managing producing these sorts of pieces>. (:wave: <@U02UATYAC4X>)
lastly, just a quick note on _*promotion*_. i kindly ask that folks keep article promotion to <#C012AUSC85C|promotion>. if someone asks for a specific resource/service that you can provide, feel free to respond in the thread along with a disclaimer that it's yours/your companies. we want folks to find great resources, hire, get hired, etc. but also want to be careful that we keep the discourse productive, helpful and free of noise. i'm always open to feedback on this, so please send any you have my way. thank you all for making this a wonderful place to hang out!
---
okay, jobs!
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Hubstaff is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/242962-content-manager-team-leader-hubstaff|Content Manager (Team Leader)> ($90-130k):zap:
• Clever Real Estate is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/242882-content-team-lead-clever-real-estate|Content Team Lead> ($80-110k):zap:

• Resource Guru is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/238749-senior-content-marketer-saasb2b-pound60-pound80k-resource-guru|Senior Content Marketer SaaS/B2B (£60-£80k) >(:wave: <@U011TDNU0KY>) 
• Podia is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225913-senior-lead-content-marketer-remote-podia|Senior Lead Content Marketer (Remote)> (:wave: <@UN29JC48H>)

• mParticle is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/235092-content-marketing-manager-mparticle|Content Marketing Manager> 
• Brightwheel is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/233386-director-of-content-marketing-brightwheel|Director of Content Marketing> ($156k-$203k)
• Crelate️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232859-senior-content-marketing-manager-crelate|Senior Content Marketing Manager> 
• Protocol Labs is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/231602-editorial-content-lead-protocol-labs|Editorial Content Lead> ️
• O️penPhone is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/231924-head-of-content-openphone|Head of Content> 
• Clinician’s Brief is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216957-director-digital-content-and-audience-growth-brief-media|Director, Digital Content & Audience Growth> :tv: (:wave: <@U02NDCYLUGK>) ️
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229245-senior-manager-of-customer-experience-verblio|Senior Manager of Customer Experience>️ and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219408-content-marketing-manager-verblio|Content Marketing Manager> :tv: (:wave: <@U02EL2NBYGL>)
• Podia is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225913-lead-content-marketer-remote-podia|Lead Content Marketer (Remote)> (:wave: <@UJ7RT1J1X>)
• Ahrefs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225703-senior-content-marketer-martech-ahrefs|Senior Content Marketer (MarTech)> ️($40-100k)

• Appcues is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/218016-content-marketing-manager-appcues|Content Marketing Manager>
• Avive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222645-content-and-communications-marketing-manager-avive|Content & Communications Marketing Manager> ($80-120k) :tv: (:wave: <@U013BG9P1UN>)
• Mira Health is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219888-content-strategist-mira-health|Content Strategist> ️️
• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager>
• Omniscient Digital is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/213553-managing-editor-and-operations-lead-omniscient-digital|Managing Editor & Operations Lead> :tv: ️ (:wave: <@U0191E456RE> <@U01997SMK0F>)
• Very Good Marketing Agency is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216211-content-strategist-very-good-marketing-agency|Content Strategist> ️
• Pinwheel is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/212267-content-marketing-specialist-pinwheel|Content Marketing Specialist>
• Awesome Motive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188076-wordpress-content-writer-remote-awesome-motive-inc|WordPress Content Writer (Remote)>

:writing_hand: *freelance projects:*
• Superpath Marketplace is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/235688-freelance-writer-e-commerce-and-3d-modeling-superpath|e-commerce and 3D modeling writer> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/241640-freelance-writer-accountingforecastingmodeling-superpath-marketplace|Freelance accounting/forecasting/modeling writer>:zap:

• WordAgents is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225011-freelance-content-writer-wordagents|Freelance Content Writer>

---
• Relyance AI is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243492-technical-marketing-content-developer-relyance-ai|Technical Marketing Content Developer> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243493-privacy-marketing-content-developer-relyance-ai|Privacy Marketing Content Developer> :zap:
• Aimtal is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/241139-content-marketing-strategist-aimtal|Content Marketing Strategist>:zap:
• Tokenist is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/240479-long-form-content-manager-tokenist|Content Marketing Lead>:zap:
• Rainforest QA is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/240345-content-marketing-manager-rainforest-qa|Content Marketing Manager> :zap:
• Modus Create is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/239848-content-strategisthead-of-content-modus-create|Content Strategist/Head of Content> ($60-80k):zap:
• Different Digital is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/238900-content-marketing-manager-different-digital|Content Marketing Manager> 
• Crayon is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/238763-content-marketing-senior-specialist-crayon|Content Marketing Senior Specialist>

• Hubspot is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/233833-senior-program-manager-marketing-hubspot|Senior Program Manager> (Marketing)
• NeuroFlow is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/236340-content-marketing-manager-neuroflow|Content Marketing Manager> 
• Grata is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232635-content-marketing-manager-grata|Content Marketing Manager> ($90-120k)
• <http://Builder.io|Builder.io>️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232219-senior-content-strategist-builderio|Senior Content Strategist>

have a great weekend everyone!
:v: jimmy
